website_summaries.verdict: Shape of this double-end bag allows you to aim your strikes for both upper and lower body.
pros: Uses reinforced straps at the top and bottom to give you a secure connection
Larger and heavier than most double-end striking bags, so you will receive a heavy workout
Smooth surface allows you to use it with bare hands or gloves
Works well for both boxing and MMA
cons: Doesn't give you the quick responsiveness of smaller double-end striking bags

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. I can work on combos perfectly. Punches, kicks, knees, and elbows. The purpose of this bag is to work on your combos and speed. Not your power even though you can hit it hard as you want but it will swing around unless you tie it down from the bottom. I wish it was 60lbs so that I could really go to town on this bad boy. I think it would make it the perfect bag in my opinion. The price is Excellent. It's very affordable (gives me another excuse to justify to the lady why I need to buy another bag. A heavier one. LOL), the bag feels like it will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Blasini

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag.
customer_reviews.text: Me and my son both love this little bag. We did connect the 50# everlasting water bag to stabilize it. We filled it with play sand from Home depot like many others said to do. That made it 100% better. My 12 year old had this thing swinging in the wind so it's light and moves alot, good for focusing on footwork and striking a moving target. If I had to do it all over again, I'd like to have this design in a 100# bag and could do away with the stabilizer on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for over eight months now, and it has become my favorite. It's very versatile for working every type of punch, including to the body. It's heavy enough to take a good punch, but light enough to not cause damage to you if you decide to not wrap your hands and give it moderate intensity. Great for a quick stress relief while working on a project.
customer_reviews.author: Jarvis Buckman

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of this bag
customer_reviews.text: We purchased it for our garage as a different type of bag than the ones we use at the Muay Thai gym. There we have both traditional long heavy bags and also the much shorter "teardrop" bags. This fits somewhere in between those two. It's a great bag to practice uppercuts and body shots on, but is too light for heavy kicks. So if you're looking for something for lighter boxing/kicking and speed/agility over power, I would recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M. Chilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy bag for developing uppercuts and hooks
customer_reviews.text: Excellent heavy bag for developing uppercuts and hooks. When not tethered at the bottom, the bag's movement encourages footwork while working your combinations. Its not the best at taking power punches but at 45 lbs, that's expected. My only complaint is the attachment for hanging is not adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: ATD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy bag....
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd heavy bag for my in home boxing gym. I have a 100lb Ringside, 70lb wrecking ball and this. It's great for uppercuts and hooks and was a great addition to my gym. Reason for 4 stars and not 5 is the bag is not height adjustable due to the straps and not chains.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Unique shape allows you work on angles, uppercut, and hooks. Buy this bag. Very much worth the great price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Much better than your standard heavy bag. Delivered pre-filled.
customer_reviews.author: FingerusArthriticus

customer_reviews.title: it's good, as long as you have a bottom strap
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with the bottom strap as part of the package, for the price I am not sure why that wasn't part of it, other than that, it's good, as long as you have a bottom strap, 45 it's light so you are not hitting this with power shots. You have to do it for speed, fast punches.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: This Punching /Kicking Bag is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like this Punching / Kicking Bag very much. I wish I would have found this one a long time ago. Very good for Punching and Kicking. I like how you can punch a firmer area in the middle. I like the Color of it too....... My two favorite colors Black and Blue. As long you don't hit it with any sharp objects i'm sure it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: G. Evans

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: great exercise, not too heavy, just pure happiness for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Not too heavy at 45lbs so you don't wreck your hands. Forgot heavy. Go with something that swings a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great for cardio, easier on the wrists for uppercuts and hooks, than a traditional heavy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Windon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy, good price and durable. I strike the bag several days a week...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, though it's light
customer_reviews.text: This is the only bag I use anymore. I'm not hardcore into martial arts like I was, but the curve on this makes it so you have a variety of angles to hit from changing your strikes fairly dynamically, and provides a target to hit. This is however a light bag so you'll want another for brute force kicking and hitting. The bungy cord will go pretty fast too so get a better quality one from a menards or lowes
customer_reviews.author: Jeff the aeroETop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: punching away
customer_reviews.text: I do love this. I wanted to use this when I first received it. It was really easy to set up once I received my stand. I have this outside and place a cover over it when it is not in use. I find this is really durable. Love that the four bands connect and that the hook is strong. This is great to hit around and practice your punches. I get a great workout with this bag. I like the shape and have even tried kicks with it. I received this item for my honest opinion and was not compensated for it.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: got Boxing?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Combat Sports Heavy Boxing Bag for my husband (and son) to use while working out in our large barn. Right now we have our exercise equipment in our barn, but we may move it to our oversize garage. My husband loves boxing and it gives him something for physical exercise to strengthen his arms while he's building his model train room in his "man cave". He was thrilled and so surprised that I'd get something like this for him. But we're just recently retired, and we need to stay active and in shape so we can hike the nearby rocky mountains this summer and next.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great bag is the height is right for you
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and well designed bag for boxers looking to train at new angles (especially uppercuts) or folks looking for a mixed martial arts bag. The bag is well made (it has a nice durable shell), and should be easy enough for you to mount (you'll need to figure that out based on your needs). I definitely wouldn't skimp on the bottom bungee. The biggest negative is that it's a bit hard to use at different heights.
customer_reviews.author: Shane O. Laake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy bag allows for more types of blows than a standard bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm a complete novice with these heavy bags, but I'm learning (husband is teaching me). We have a standard straight sided heavy bag, then we got this one and it really has quite a bit more variety that you can build into your workout. The straight sided one is like hitting a brick wall, this one, when not tethered, swings a bit and has curves that allow for teaching more types of blows than the standard heavy bag. This is an awesome bag, even for a novice.
customer_reviews.author: Mary, Reviewer's Diary

customer_reviews.title: ... not that heavy but is solid and provides a great workout. You definitely need to know what you're ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not that heavy but is solid and provides a great workout. You definitely need to know what you're doing to "install" - this is very much NOT a toy and is a real workout bag. It only hooks at the top, so the bag moves as you work it, and can pack quite a "punch" itself if you are not nimble on your feet as it swings back. The curve makes it interesting, and provides for working different angles of kicks and punches.
customer_reviews.author: Nosnivel

customer_reviews.title: Great For Uppercuts
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heavy bag. It is mainly used to practice uppercuts, but you can get a good workout just going crazy punching it. It does swing side to side when hit though as it isn't too heavy. I was enjoying throwing some uppercuts and getting a decent workout hitting this bag. I don't do any professional fighting or anything, but this was a great stress reliever. You will need gloves as it does not feel good hitting with your bare hands.
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: A nice feeling heavy bag
customer_reviews.text: A very nice heavy bag, feels sturdy and well-built. The straps are stitched directly into the bag and do not have any give when tugging on them. Set up is easy (assuming you have a location in mind) and feels good with gloves or even without when doing light strikes. It did have a little bit of a plasticky smell when first pulled out of the box, but it dissipated quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Storm the Penguin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed bag for kicking and uppercuts..... Well made leather bag..... I mounted mine on a heavy duty pulley with a cable so I could easily adjust the height ....... It's perfect for side and head kick practice, just adjust your height...... It's a perfect addition for an existing bag room or even a good starting piece....
customer_reviews.author: 1 Guys Take

customer_reviews.title: Stress reliever!
customer_reviews.text: I am sure the UPS driver was thrilled to deliver this, considering what the box looked like when it arrived. Between work and school, this the perfect solution to de-stress. Really solid design, along with the straps to hold it up. I have it hanging from a beam in my garage currently, looking to find something that will hold it by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Alan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the home gym
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our home gym. This is a well constructed piece of equipment designed for the profession and use for the amateur. We also have Combat Sports Thai style gloves for use with the bag. It was easy to install to a support beam.
customer_reviews.author: Parker-Moore Family

customer_reviews.title: Good for light use, well made
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, durable... material is heavy duty, so it should take a beating (literally). I wish the bag was a bit heavier, but it works just fine for light sparring.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made bag made all the better by the interesting design. Heavy duty hardware combined with tough shell, I expect this to have a decent lifespan. As others have mentioned, the straps mean lack of adjustment which is a drawback but the only one as far as I'm concerned. Comes ready to attach bottom straps for support and provides a solid yet irregular approach. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

product_meta.title: Combat Sports Double-End Heavy Bag (45 -Pound)
product_meta.description: Ideal for teaching upper-cuts 45-Pound weight Requires 20 dollars additional shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
